attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Planning applications for counrty folk trying to get back to there place of birth of origin should be taken into consideration. Stop making the counrty side a preserve for the rich and for second home owners. If local people want to stay local and have a planning application, and they come form the village. If it helps keep them there this right should be considered favourably and planning consent should be given.
